strings.signIn_description: Sign in with your Subnodal Account to get coding! Your code, apps, settings and more will all be stored with your Subnodal Account for you to access from anywhere.
strings.signIn_signUpHint: Don't have a Subnodal Account yet? Signing up is free and easy!
strings.authError: Sorry, we ran into a problem when signing you in. Please try again later.
strings.editor_connectionError: Looks like we couldn't connect to your NanoPlay! Try connecting again.
strings.editor_connectionErrorPersistent: Looks like we still can't connect to your NanoPlay!
strings.editor_noBluetooth: No Bluetooth? Don't worry! Visit the NanoPlay editor on your mobile phone to connect to your NanoPlay.
strings.editor_noBluetoothQrCode: Point your phone's camera at this QR code to quickly visit the NanoPlay editor
